/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the glow of a bright sun. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the urban landscape. The street is lined with a variety of buildings and shops, their facades adorned with colorful signs and advertisements that add a vibrant touch to the scene. Cars and bicycles are scattered along the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle typical of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light.
